r.s: Client extension for Sphinx - opensource SQL full-text search engine
r.d: This extension provides bindings for libsphinxclient, client library for Sphinx.
r.n: - Fixed setRankingMode's proto and add new ranking mode constants (patch by Michael Squires) - Fixed segfault when reading object properties. - Fixed bug #62026 (Second param in setRankingMode should be optional)
